column5: I am looking for a cabin on or near the Red at selkirk for 3-8 guys. any info??????
Check the archives from last fall. Someone had just what you want and then there was a bunch of talk about them needing an outfitter permit. Look in Sept & Oct. JSO

stay at stu's on cats on the red great also if you want a guide when are you planning your trip ice or open water.... let me know when you are coming and maybe i can help you out manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....
fall 2008. always stay at pine falls, but would like to consentrate our efforts on the red once. thanks for any info
well stu is very handy for that right on the water.... and always willing to give good advice manitoba .... a 100,000 lakes how many walleyes ???? i will never have enough time....

Stu has the only lodge on the Red River. He has a motel unit that sleeps 4 per unit as well as a house that will accommodate up to 11 people. Like MW said, he's right on the river, has the best boat launch and will provide you with all the updates and information. Plus, he has been known to fry fillets that will have you begging for more. Cats On The Red.....204-757-9876
